## NetgrepResult type

A result object returned for a search. The `T` generic represents the metadata passed in the search method used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NetgrepResult<T extends object = object> = {
    url: string;
    pattern: string;
    result: boolean;
    metadata?: T;
};
```
